page.description: Settings for configuring a container, including adding items, show/hide expressions, and styles.

description.p: One or more classes to apply to the container control.
Specify in-line styling to apply to the container.
The ID of the container control in the FormView layout.
Specify an item for the container. The item will be added to the container DIV in an 'a5-item' attribute.
Specify one or more arguments for the item.
An expression that determines whether or not the container is visible in the FormView layout.
An optional value that is set in the a5-value attribute of the container. The value is passed to event handlers defined in the item.
